title: How do I get unlock for all features and data?
content:
At power on, pixel shows everytime time as 1.30 Thursday 1 Jan.  "Unlock for all features and data "is displayed at bottom alongwith lock button, but the lock is not opening by either touching on finger sensor or by moving up the touchpad on lock symbol
Even iff battery is being charged, %level of battery displayed is not changing, screen remains on continuously.  If we power off and restart the phone, new battery level is displayed. 

Even safe mode does not help
